lines.i: This is a results document section intended to hold the values of behavioral health assessment scores and subscores. This is part of a summary report that may be exchanged across specialties to support continuity of care. Other related results may be included in this section.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] sensitivityCode with data type Code
This attribute is used to specify that the content of this clinical document is sensitive because it contains Behavioral Health information.
Contains zero or one [0..1] assessment, where its type is Assessment
